com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Renderable

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Component wrapper for a LibGDX Sprite.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      Default constructor for blank/null sprite.
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Constructs a Sprite with no source rectangle, and its origin at its center.
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle source)
      Constructs a Sprite with its origin at its center.
      Sprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle source, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin)
      Constructs a Sprite.

      void onRemove(ComponentManager container)
      Called when this Component is removed from a ComponentManager.
      void setOrigin(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin)
      Sets the origin that should be used when rotating this component, in relation to its bottom left corner.
      void setPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)
      Sets the Sprite's center position.
      void setRotation(float degrees)
      Sets the Sprite's rotation, in degrees.
      void setScale(float scale)
      Sets the scale that should be applied when this component is drawn.
